text: A uan ghuzim isa en navir averiaba kavkɨnigha dar akɨrizɨ, e kamaghɨn fo, e arazir kuraba puvatɨgha Godɨn damazimɨn bar zue. Egha a dɨpar bar dɨkɨriamɨn en mɨkarziba rue. Kamaghɨn amizɨma e ifavarir arazir en navir averiabar itiba e bar da ateghɨva, egh okam nɨghnɨghan koghɨva nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨ, egh an boroghɨn mangam.
